::KitKat::

She downed the rest of her drink. "Oh I'll need your help alright."
She got up, got a third drink and sat back down."I'll need your help 
training these bots. They need to be combat ready in a only a few 
weeks. Days prefered, but it may take two or three weeks to give 
these bots a crach course, sure they can fight, but they need to be 
trained as a team." She down the whole drink in one swallow.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Oh, ok. If you need any help at all, tell me." He said.
> His plan was stil on. But then another thought accured, what if he 
had
> to hurt her, to accomplish his plan. He would not, under any
> circomstances, do that. He would rather die.
